description: My place is close to Several subway lines that can get you to Manhattan in 15 minutes, plus all the many bars, restaurants and amenities of Williamsburg. We also have a cat, Cleo, who we will ask you to feed during your stay. In exchange we're offering a lower rate than you'll find for similar listings in the area.. You’ll love my place because of the location and because it's a comfy, cosy and spacious apartment. My place is good for couples and solo adventurers.
name: Spacious 1BR Williamsburg apartment at great price
